trans-unit.source: If your developer account has been granted the appropriate permissions, you can generate and download preinstall packages that an OEM can use to include your app in their image.
trans-unit.target: If your developer account has been granted the appropriate permissions, you can generate and download preinstall packages that an OEM can use to include your app in their image.

trans-unit.source: Generate preinstall packages for OEMs
trans-unit.target: Generate preinstall packages for OEMs

trans-unit.source: Generate preinstall packages for OEMs
trans-unit.target: Generate preinstall packages for OEMs

trans-unit.source: If your developer account has been granted the appropriate permissions, you can generate and download preinstall packages that an OEM can use to include your app in their image.
trans-unit.target: If your developer account has been granted the appropriate permissions, you can generate and download preinstall packages that an OEM can use to include your app in their image.

trans-unit.source: Preinstall permissions are only enabled on developer accounts that are sponsored by OEMs.
trans-unit.target: Preinstall permissions are only enabled on developer accounts that are sponsored by OEMs.

trans-unit.source: Important preinstall policy & limitations
trans-unit.target: Important preinstall policy & limitations

trans-unit.source: Preinstall apps must be certified through Windows Dev Center to have the latest Store license so that they are able to connect to the Store and receive app updates.
trans-unit.target: Preinstall apps must be certified through Windows Dev Center to have the latest Store license so that they are able to connect to the Store and receive app updates.

trans-unit.source: Any app that is already preinstalled must be and remain free in all markets.
trans-unit.target: Any app that is already preinstalled must be and remain free in all markets.

trans-unit.source: Generating preinstall packages
trans-unit.target: Generating preinstall packages

trans-unit.source: Once an account has been enabled with preinstall permissions, complete the following steps:
trans-unit.target: Once an account has been enabled with preinstall permissions, complete the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In your dashboard, navigate to the app that is to be preinstalled.
trans-unit.target: In your dashboard, navigate to the app that is to be preinstalled.

trans-unit.source: In the left navigation menu, expand **App management** and then click **Current packages**.
trans-unit.target: In the left navigation menu, expand **App management** and then click **Current packages**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Request packages for OS preinstallation** section, click **Enable downloadable packages**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Request packages for OS preinstallation** section, click **Enable downloadable packages**.

trans-unit.source: A confirmation dialog will appear, noting that apps preinstalled on an OS prior to Windows 10 must be free.
trans-unit.target: A confirmation dialog will appear, noting that apps preinstalled on an OS prior to Windows 10 must be free.

trans-unit.source: Select **Enable.**
trans-unit.target: Select **Enable.**

trans-unit.source: Find the package that you want to download, and click the appropriate **Generate package** link.
trans-unit.target: Find the package that you want to download, and click the appropriate **Generate package** link.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Generation time for preinstall packages will vary depending on the size of the package you have selected.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Generation time for preinstall packages will vary depending on the size of the package you have selected.

trans-unit.source: You can leave this page and come back later, or leave the page open.
trans-unit.target: You can leave this page and come back later, or leave the page open.

trans-unit.source: When the package has been generated, a link to **Download package** will appear.
trans-unit.target: When the package has been generated, a link to **Download package** will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click this link to download the .zip file.
trans-unit.target: Click this link to download the .zip file.

trans-unit.source: You can then provide this .zip file to the OEM for inclusion in their OS image.
trans-unit.target: You can then provide this .zip file to the OEM for inclusion in their OS image.

trans-unit.source: Support
trans-unit.target: Support

trans-unit.source: If you have further questions about generating preinstall packages, please email <partnerops@microsoft.com>.
trans-unit.target: If you have further questions about generating preinstall packages, please email <partnerops@microsoft.com>.
